titleStmt.title: The present duty and endeavour of the saints. Opened in a sermon at Pauls upon the Lords day December, 14th. 1645. / By Joseph Caryl, minister of the Gospell at Magnus neere London-Bridge.
titleStmt.author: Caryl, Joseph, 1602-1673.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Forcet for George Hurlock, and are to be sold at his shop at Magnus-corner.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "1645"; the second 6 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
